thread.title: Sports news in brief, Oct. 8, 2015

author: The Associated Press
title: Sports news in brief, Oct. 8, 2015
text:
Sports news in brief, Oct. 8, 2015 
NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell, left, arrives during the NFL owners meeting Wednesday in New York. The owners will further consider the desire of three franchises — the St. Louis Rams, Oakland Raiders and San Diego Chargers — to move to Los Angeles. Richard Drew/The Associated Press Posted: Wednesday, October 7, 2015 11:38 pm | Updated: 12:00 am, Thu Oct 8, 2015. 
NFL approves more international games, some outside England 
NEW YORK — The NFL’s appetite for playing games abroad has increased. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
